tool.name: OTB.Pansharpening
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayinp False isArrayinxs False output_data_out $output_data_out name OTB.Pansharpening inp $inp inxs $inxs out $out method $method method.lmvm.radiusx $method.lmvm.radiusx method.lmvm.radiusy $method.lmvm.radiusy method.bayes.lambda $method.bayes.lambda method.bayes.s $method.bayes.s ram $ram prefer $prefer response $response outputType_out $OutputSection_out.outputType_out transmissionMode_out $OutputSection_out.transmissionMode_out

param.name: inp
param.label: Input panchromatic image.
param.help: Input panchromatic image. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: jpeg, png, tiff

param.name: inxs
param.label: Input XS image.
param.help: Input XS image. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: jpeg, png, tiff

param.name: method.lmvm.radiusx
param.label: Set the x radius of the sliding window.
param.help: Set the x radius of the sliding window.

param.name: method.lmvm.radiusy
param.label: Set the y radius of the sliding window.
param.help: Set the y radius of the sliding window.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This application performs P+XS pansharpening. Pansharpening is a process of merging high-resolution panchromatic and lower resolution multispectral imagery to create a single high-resolution color image. Algorithms available in the applications are: RCS, bayesian fusion and Local Mean and Variance Matching(LMVM).
